report.title: UKBMS Occurrence Download Report with Confidential
report.description: Lists occurrences including confidential. Normally invoked from download tab on annual summary page.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN samples parent ON parent.id = o.parent_sample_id JOIN samples child ON child.id = o.sample_id JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON child.location_id=l2.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# #location_list# #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.parent_sample_id as sample_id, o.id as occurrence_id, ctt.term as site_type, l.code as site_code, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, l2.code as section_name, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, cttl.preferred_taxon as preferred

order_bys.order_by: l.code, parent.date_start, l2.code, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, o.id DESC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: year
param.where: parent.date_end >= CAST('#year#-01-01' as date) AND parent.date_start <= CAST('#year#-12-31' as date)

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: ID of the taxon list to show

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: loc2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smp2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: location_list
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs
